awards.title: Highest File Count PR
awards.subtitle: The PR with the highest number of files.

awards.title: Lowest File Count PR
awards.subtitle: The PR with the least number of files.

awards.title: Most Comments on a PR
awards.subtitle: The PR with the highest number of comments on it.

awards.title: Most Approvals on a PR
awards.subtitle: The PR with the most number of approvals from the team.

awards.title: Largest PR
awards.subtitle: The PR with the largest amount of code changes.

awards.title: Smallest PR
awards.subtitle: The PR with the least amount of code changes.

awards.title: Fanciest PR
awards.subtitle: The PR with the most bells and whistles - nice description, fancy photos/videos, etc.
